wikipedia_page.main: Perrie Louise Edwards (born 10 July 1993) is an English singer and member of the British girl group Little Mix. As of 2021, the group have sold over 60 million records worldwide, making them one of the world's best-selling girl groups of all time.Edward's in 2011 first auditioned for the eighth series of The X Factor as a solo act and made it through to bootcamp stage. However after her elimination, she was placed into a group with three other members to form the girl group Little Mix, and made history by becoming the first group to win the British version of the series. Since the group's formation they have sold over 2 million concert tickets worldwide and have released six studio albums, and achieved five number-one singles on the UK Singles Chart.Edwards has also co-wrote songs for Little Mix albums from the beginning, including two UK number one singles "Wings" and "Shout Out to My Ex." Aside from music, she is the first female ambassador for the brand "Supreme Nutrition", and in 2021 she launched her own lifestyle and fashion brand called Disora.
